title: There's... Johnny!
overview: 1972, Burbank, California. 19-year-old Andy Klavin is surprised to have stumbled his way into a job at "The Tonight Show" starring his hero, Johnny Carson. A coming-of-age story, we follow this kid who up till now has never left Nebraska, and is now caught up in the glamorous, fast lane of Hollywood. Sex, drugs, rock & roll - and show business; it's a long, magical journey ahead.
